about_the_game:
This tileset is inspired by the cityscape of the 1980s, reminiscent of the previous work "SERIALGAMES Living Good City Tileset ".
It is ideal for creating adventure games with a nostalgic yet distinctive atmosphere set in the 1980s urban environment.

It consists of tiles A2, A4, A5, and B, each of which contains a scene pattern based on the three time axes of "day, evening, and night".
Enjoy creating various effects for any setting.
The game also includes variations of "daytime, evening, and nighttime," so you can create your own effects based on the time axis.
The world view can be further expanded by combining this set with the " SERIALGAMES Living Good City Tileset ".

* This set is usable even if you don't own the "Serial Games - Living Good City Tileset."

■Content
Tiles A2, A4, A5, B (12 sheets each with daytime, evening, and night patterns)

Tile A2: Soil, puddles, roads, tiles, etc.
Tile A4: 12 variations of building and house patterns
Tile A5: Asphalt lanes and crosswalks on asphalt
Tile B: Store materials, shopping street arcades, vehicles (cars, buses, motorcycles), tin roofs, doors, windows, illuminated signs, vending machines, gachapon, sweet potato cart, etc.
Daytime, evening, and night versions of the above tile sets are also included.

Sample maps (project data) are also included.

----------

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
